Alteration 8

Time Stop:Unknown Effect 133 (104)?
 
(Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], May Use Underwater [uwok])
This powerful alteration will slow down time to almost a standstill for everyone but the caster. Any ongoing effects like regeneration or heat clouds will also be slowed down, regardless if they affect the caster or not.
Time Slow: 90%. Duration: about 5 rounds of combat. There can only be one time stop in effect at once, a new one will replace an ongoing one.
